actions.text: By unanimous consent, the Hastings (FL) amendment was withdrawn.

purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the appropriation for "Federal Election Commission--salaries and expenses" by $600,000,000 and by decreasing each other amount appropriated or otherwise made available by this Act which is not required to be appropriated or otherwise made available by a provision of law by such equivalent percentage as is necessary to reduce the aggregate amount appropriated for all such amounts by the amount of the increase provided under this section.
